name: GGRS Plot Operator
description: High-performance faceted plotting using the GGRS library

properties.name: plot.width
properties.description: Plot width in pixels. If left empty or 'auto', dimensions will be derived from the crosstab/facet layout.

properties.name: plot.height
properties.description: Plot height in pixels. If left empty or 'auto', dimensions will be derived from the crosstab/facet layout.
